slides.title: Welcome to CIMA E1
slides.content:
# E1 - Managing Finance in a Digital World

E1 covers **technology** and **operations** management.

## What You Will Learn

- **Digital Tech** - Systems and data
- **Information** - Management systems
- **Operations** - Business processes
- **Finance Function** - Modern role

## Syllabus Areas

| Area | Weight |
|------|--------|
| Digital environment | 25% |
| Information systems | 30% |
| Operations | 25% |
| Finance function | 20% |
